[[inst_hl_swi_upr]]
==== HL.SWI.UPR

*Syntax:* hl.swi.upr SrcD, [SrcR, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_swi_upr.svg[HL.SWI.UPR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PRE_INDEX
